outline:
1. to cut, sharpen, decide, decree, determine, maim, move, be decisive, be mutilated
    1. (Qal)
      1. to cut, mutilate
      2. to sharpen
      3. to decide
    2. (Niphal) to be decisive
kjv_def: bestir self, decide, decree, determine, maim, move.
strongs_def: properly, to point sharply, i.e. (literally) to wound; figuratively, to be alert, to decide
